title: How to Make a Cookies and Cream Mug Cake

steps.headline: Stir the white chocolate chips and milk together.
steps.description: In a microwave-safe mug, mix the two ingredients until well-combined.

steps.headline: Microwave for 40 seconds until the mixture has melted slightly.
steps.description: Stir gently with a whisk or fork until properly combined and the mixture has fully melted.

steps.headline: Pour in the flour, baking soda, sugar, milk, oil, and vanilla extract.
Add the Oreo cookies and crush them into the mixture.
steps.description: Use a spoon or fork to smash the cookies and cream into small crumbs.

steps.headline: Microwave the mug cake for one minute.
Allow the mug cake to cool until warm.
Serve.
steps.description: Garnish the cookies and cream mug cake with whipped cream or crushed Oreo cookies. Enjoy!

text: Stir the white chocolate chips and milk together. In a microwave-safe mug, mix the two ingredients until well-combined. Microwave for 40 seconds until the mixture has melted slightly. Stir gently with a whisk or fork until properly combined and the mixture has fully melted. Pour in the flour, baking soda, sugar, milk, oil, and vanilla extract. Mix well with a spoon. Add the Oreo cookies and crush them into the mixture. Use a spoon or fork to smash the cookies and cream into small crumbs. Microwave the mug cake for one minute.  Allow the mug cake to cool until warm.  Serve. Garnish the cookies and cream mug cake with whipped cream or crushed Oreo cookies. Enjoy!
